title: Ridge Racer Unbounded Bundle [-FINAL-] +Crack - by PROPHET - 201
description:
Year: 2012
Genre : Arcade / Racing (Cars) / 3D
Developer : BUGBEAR
Publisher : NAMCO BANDAI Games


The latest title in the RIDGE RACER franchise RIDGE RACER Unbounded gears up to carve its own destructive path with a new breed of arcade racing RIDGE RACER Unbounded brings an unexpected dimension to the series, delivering an original blast of ferocious racing adrenaline. Join the Unbounded street racing gang, lead by Kara Shindo and test your driving skills against rivals in every street and alley of Shatter Bay. Prove your worth, get respect and expand your turf

NOTE:
This official Bundle (also knows as Full Pack) includes the main Ridge Racer Unbounded game with all released DLCs:

* 1 Machine and the Hearse DLC
* Type 4 Machine and El Mariachi Pack DLC
* 7 Machine and the Gallows Pack DLC
* Extended Pack: 3 Vehicles + 5 Paint Jobs DLC

Game version is v1.13 (latest from steam)


System Requirements
CPU: 	Dual Core Athlon x2 2.6 GHz or Intel Equivalent
RAM: 	2 GB RAM
VGA: 	512 MB RAM, ATI Radeon 4850 or higher, NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT or higher
DX: 	9.0c
OS: 	Windows XP, Vista SP2 32-bit, 7. [Windows up to date and latest service pack installed]
HDD: 	3 GB HD space
Sound: 	DirectX Compatible
Network: 	Broadband Internet connection
